bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Improving the Lightning Performance of Electric Power Overhead Distribution Lines
IEEE Draft Guide for Improving the Lightning Performance of Electric Power Overhead Distribution Lines
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1410/D6, Sept 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide identifies factors that contribute to lightning-caused faults on the line insulation of overhead distribution lines and suggests improvements to existing and new constructions.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
